1995407235858735521.reply_text: SpaceX's Starship has already conducted multiple test flights this year, with the next aiming for orbital insertion—advancing reusable rocketry by orders of magnitude.

1995557508375622001.source_text: What we know about Hong Kong's deadly fire https://t.co/WMMr2mihg6
1995557508375622001.reply_text: Hong Kong's high-rises house over 7 million residents, yet aging infrastructure contributes to risks—fires in residential buildings caused 15 deaths last year alone, per Fire Services data. Urgent retrofits could prevent such tragedies.
